channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [AMQ-4978] JoramJmsNioTest hangs intermittently
item.description:
The JoramJmsNioTest hangs intermittently, particularly on CI nodes. I'll add a stack trace.

This is most likely fixed by QPID 0.26. Re-test once that is released.

$ jstack 7157
2014-01-20 10:14:31

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Fixed as part of AMQ-5073
